member.name: M:BannerTest.Api.Controllers.BannersController.Get(System.String)
member.summary: Returns an array of banners by query. At least one query parameter must be filled in.

member.name: M:BannerTest.Api.Controllers.BannersController.Create(BannerTest.Api.Models.CreateBannerModel)
member.summary: Creates a banner. Title must be unique.

member.name: M:BannerTest.Api.Controllers.BannersController.Update(System.Int32,BannerTest.Api.Models.UpdateBannerModel)
member.summary: Updates a banner. Title, again, must be unique in case it has changed.
